Articles.Content:
I have a texture bug after installing scatterer on 1.8.1. U have to zoom in or be very close to the ground for any texture to appear (on all planets). A link with a screenshoot: https://imgur.com/a/kIn58Ey

Edited February 10, 2021 by streamdark04

I've seen that issue recently, but in KSP 1.11.1; it was most likely due to using a version of scatterer that was incompatible with the graphics mods I was using (in my case, RSSVE for Real Solar System). Check that you're using the correct version of scatterer for 1.8.1 and that any other visual mods you might be using (AVP/Spectra/SVE/etc) are also compatible with 1.8.1; a mod list would help here.
